data.title: Obituary for Richard Martino
data.meta_description: Richard Martino | Passed away on Feb 14, 2014 | Richard H. Martino, Sr. passed away on... Learn More
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Richard Martino | Russo's Hillside Chapels
data.text:
Richard H. Martino, Sr. passed away on Friday, February 14 at the age of 62. Devoted father of Christiana M. Martino-Vega, Richard H. Martino, Jr. and Amanda (Vito) Calace. Loving son of Dominick and the late Miriam, nee Granatelli, Martino. Fond grandfather of Alexander, Eric, Vito, and Dominick. Dear brother of Sherry (the late Vince) Zitello, Michael (Joanne), Dominick, John (Cyndy), Anthony, and Donna (Billy) Johnson. Dear uncle and great uncle to many. Special friend to Laura Lentz. Family and friends are to gather for the funeral on Saturday, February 22, 2014, 10:00 A.M. at Russo's Hillside Chapels, 4500 Roosevelt Road, Hillside, IL 60162 (between Mannheim and Wolf Road). A chapel service will be celebrated promptly at 11:00 A.M. Interment will be private. Visitation Friday, February 21, 2014 3-9 P.M. For additional info (708) 449-5300. Please visit Richard's personal tribute website at www.russohillsidechapels.com and sign the guestbook.

To send flowers to the family or plant a tree in memory of Richard Martino, please visit our floral store.
